    • Uses of Variable in net.sodacan.module.variable

      Classes in net.sodacan.module.variable that implement Variable 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ClockVariable  
      class  ConfigVariable
      Provide access to selected configuration settings
      class  ModuleVariable  
      class  ShortcutVariable
      A Shortcut variable is like any other variable except that it also contains a condition as well.
      class  SubscribeVariable
      A subscribe variable is just like any normal module variable except that it has additional attributes available that access the underlying message that populates the variable.
